channel.title: CONS on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in CONS on TechnoStreet

item.title: Unilever’s Health Data Shows Junk-Food Metrics Are Up For Debate
item.description: Unilever’s Health Data Shows Junk-Food Metrics Are Up For Debate Unilever said Friday it’s now aiming for 85% of its servings to meet its own science-based nutrition criteria by 2028.

item.title: Amazon Slips Below $1 Trillion in Value After Bleak Outlook
item.description: Amazon Slips Below $1 Trillion in Value After Bleak Outlook The e-commerce giant joins a long list of US companies seeing their market values crumble.

item.title: Musk-Twitter Countdown to Close $44 Billion Deal Begins
item.description: Musk-Twitter Countdown to Close $44 Billion Deal Begins After months of “will they or won’t they,” Elon Musk is running up against a court-ordered deadline to deliver on his promise to buy Twitter Inc.

item.title: Singapore Proposes Ban on Borrowing to Fund Cryptocurrency Purchases
item.description: Singapore Proposes Ban on Borrowing to Fund Cryptocurrency Purchases Singapore proposed to ban retail investors from borrowing to fund cryptocurrency purchases, moving to tighten regulatory regime.

item.title: Ye’s Antisemitic Rants Wreck Path To Multibillion-Dollar Fortune
item.description: Ye’s Antisemitic Rants Wreck Path To Multibillion-Dollar Fortune The rapper lost out on a lucrative deal with Adidas, which said it would end the Yeezy line after facing blowback.
